entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Wind light except east 40 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
